mapper.select: select t.userId as userId, t.talkCode as talkCode, t.talkCont as talkCont, t.talkDate as talkDate, t.talkLike as talkLike, t.talkVideo as talkVideo, (select u.nickName from user u where t.userId = u.userId) as nickName from talk t where t.talkCode = #{talkCode}
select *, (select u.nickName from user u where tc.userId = u.userId) as nickName from recipe.talkcom tc where tc.talkCode = #{talkCode}
mapper.insert: insert into talk (talkCode,talkCont, userId ,talkDate,talkVideo,talkLike) values (#{talkCode},#{talkCont},#{userId},(select curdate()),#{talkVideo},#{talkLike})
mapper.select: select talkCont from talk where talkCont =#{talkCont} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: update talk set talkCont=#{talkCont} where userId=#{userId} and talkCode=#{talkCode}
